se350.elevatorSim.elevatorcontroller

Class ElevatorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • se350.elevatorSim.elevatorcontroller.ElevatorController

  • public class ElevatorController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for making decisions of which elevators to send to which floors. Gets calls from ElevatorCallboxes and uses ElevatorDecisionDelegates to decide where to send which elevators.
    Author:
    Shahzaib Syed

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DOWN
      Elevator State - moving down
      static int NONE
      Elevator State - is not moving
      static int UP
      Elevator State - moving up

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkIfPendingNowValid()
      Checks the pending requests every second to see if they are now able to be executed.
      static void destroy()
      Used for testing building creation.
      ElevatorDTO[] getElevatorData()
      Private method that gets generates an array of ElevatorDTO's that contain the information necessary for the delegates to choose which elevator is the best option for a request

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(BuildingDTO buildingStats)
                       throws InvalidParameterException
        Initializes the Elevator controller to be used. MUST be called before any calls to getInstance or any other public method.
        Parameters:
        buildingStats - - The data block that holds neccessary information about the elevators
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - - If data passed into the new elevators is invalid

      • destroy

        public static void destroy()
        Used for testing building creation.

      • getInstance

        public static ElevatorController getInstance()
        Returns the single instance of ElevatorController in singleton fashion
        Returns:
        The single instance of ElevatorController

      • sendRequest

        public int sendRequest(int direction,
              int floor)
                throws InvalidParameterException
        Public method that is called by ElevatorControlBox that creates a new pending request in the Elevator Controller.
        Parameters:
        direction - - Up or down, depending on what the Person needs
        floor - - The floor that needs to be added to requests.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException

      • sendRequestToElevator

        public void sendRequestToElevator(int elevatorId,
                         int floor)
                           throws InvalidParameterException
        Utility method that allows the simulation "driver" to send requests to the elevators.
        Parameters:
        elevatorId - - Which elevator to send
        floor - - The floor to send the elevator to
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - if the elevatorId is greater than the number of elevators or less than 1
        InvalidParameterException - if the floor is greater or less than the number of floors

      • checkIfPendingNowValid

        public void checkIfPendingNowValid()
                            throws InvalidParameterException
        Checks the pending requests every second to see if they are now able to be executed.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - if the requests to the elevator are not valid floors.

      • getElevatorData

        public ElevatorDTO[] getElevatorData()
        Private method that gets generates an array of ElevatorDTO's that contain the information necessary for the delegates to choose which elevator is the best option for a request
        Returns:
        An array of information about each Elevator instance
